text:
Hey folks I'm looking for a freelancer skilled in web dev and interactive quiz type elements.
just wondering if you can recommend someone for a small project I'm planning?

I want to ask my reader 3 Qs to make sure they get to the right piece of content.
Ultimately, this will look like some kind of interactive click through (a bit like a yes/no on typeform but better)

We'll create a piece of content for each combination of platform we offer and I need a developer/UX builder person to get them to that content.
Looks like Ion Interactive is the type of solution we would use if we did it ourselves - so that kind of thing.

1. Does that make any sense?
2. Know anybody that could do a solid job?

Recommendations and examples please!
